title: Nether Eats
author: Chef Elarius
pages: Warped forests and nether wastes hold unique culinary delights. Behold the Hoglin, your source of cooked porkchops.
Slay the beast and cook the drops to restore hunger magnificently.
Mushrooms grow plentiful in the Nether. Combine brown and red with a bowl to make Mushroom Stew.
Stews are wholesome and warming, perfect for navigating the blistering heat.
Trade with Piglins for rare mushrooms and brewing ingredients.
The Nether offers culinary adventures like no other: embrace it with courage!
